Project.How do you plan to prepare the dataset: The Filecoin data preparation process mainly includes data encapsulation and verification. First, the storage provider splits the user data into fixed-size sectors, then encodes and encrypts each sector. Afterward, technologies such as zero-knowledge proofs are used to verify the encapsulated data, ensuring the integrity and reliability of the data so that it can be securely stored in the network.
